alert.note: Alert for Pawnee; Rush (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 2:33AM CDT until August 09 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Pawnee County in south central Kansas... Rush County in central Kansas... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 233 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near McCracken to near Nekoma to near Gray, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Nekoma around 240 AM CDT. Hargrave around 250 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Rush Center, La Crosse, Bison, Rozel, Timken and Sanford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
